answers.answer: Take things to entertain yourself! Books, music anything that you enjoy doing to pass the time, sometimes inductions can take a few days and there's a lot of waiting. Good luck.
Laptop or tablet. Surfing the internet can kill alot of time. Maybe take a craft or project you can work on in the bed

question: Im getting induced tomorrow due to having preeclampsia,  I was just wondering if there is anything I should or shouldnt do?& I have been told I wont be leaving the hospital until I have had my baby, so I was wondering if theres anything I should take with me?Thanks in advance, im so nervous and dont really know what to expect.
title: 39+2days tomorrow &getting induced
